current.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

settings.question_faqs: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
settings.answer_faqs:
Please make sure that you follow below steps:


1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file: lynkco-1.0.0-sections-ready.zip in the folder Lynkco Sections Ready 1.0.0, then you just need to upload lynkco-1.0.0-sections-ready.zip file to your Shopify store.

settings.question_faqs: What I have to do when I need your support?
settings.answer_faqs:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:


1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to support@halothemes.com

settings.question_faqs: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed

settings.question_faqs: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to support@halothemes.com, we will give you our quote. Thank you.

settings.question_faqs: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.

settings.question_faqs: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).

settings.question_faqs: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.

settings.question_faqs: What is included in the theme package?
settings.answer_faqs: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.

settings.question_faqs: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
settings.answer_faqs: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.

settings.question_faqs: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.

settings.question_faqs: Can I add borders around our product images?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.

settings.question_faqs: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
settings.answer_faqs: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://lynkco-demo.myshopify.com/collections/frontpage/products/dan-sedom-molestime-lorem

settings.des_faqs: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to support@halothemes.com

settings.custom_tab_content:
Shipping:

We currently deliver orders all over India. Free shipping is applicable on orders above INR 1999. A nominal charge of INR 99 is levied on orders below INR 1999. Orders are typically shipped within 24-48 hours (except furniture and custom items) and delivered within 3-6 working days from dispatch. You will receive an e-mail and SMS once your order has been shipped which will include details of the shipping provider and tracking number. You can track your shipment in "Your Orders" or by visiting the website of the shipping provider.

Returns:

We hope you love your Pinklay merchandise! That said, in the rare instance that you are not satisfied with your purchase, kindly contact customer care within 48 hours of receiving your merchandise for an exchange or refund. Please ensure that the merchandise is unused, in its original packaging, and in the same condition as you received it. You can request for a reverse pickup for a nominal amount via customer care or choose to ship the product to our facility using any reputable courier that offers a tracking number. All items must be received by our warehouse within 10 working days of requesting the return in order to qualify for return/exchange.

Exceptions:

1. Merchandise bought during the sale period or on sale cannot be exchanged or returned.
2. We do not accept returns or exchanges on infant merchandise for hygiene reasons.
3. We do not accept returns or exchanges on ceramics, canopy, furniture, gift cards, and customized items.

Furniture:

Our furniture is carefully crafted and packed to ensure you receive a defect-free and damage-free product. That said, in the rare case of a damage/defect, please notify customer care immediately after unboxing the furniture. We will assess the nature of damage/defect, and provide an appropriate solution.

Refunds:

We offer a store credit that is redeemable on our website (shipping fees, if any, are non-refundable).

To edit this page simply login to the control panel, click the Website Content tab and choose the View Web Pages option. Click Edit next to the Shipping & Returns page and you can change this text. A sample returns policy is shown below which you can edit as needed.

Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

To edit this page simply login to the control panel, click the Website Content tab and choose the View Web Pages option. Click Edit next to the Shipping & Returns page and you can change this text. A sample returns policy is shown below which you can edit as needed.

Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

settings.custom_tab_content:
Shipping:

We currently deliver orders all over India. Free shipping is applicable on orders above INR 1999. A nominal charge of INR 99 is levied on orders below INR 1999. Orders are typically shipped within 24-48 hours (except furniture and custom items) and delivered within 3-6 working days from dispatch. You will receive an e-mail and SMS once your order has been shipped which will include details of the shipping provider and tracking number. You can track your shipment in "Your Orders" or by visiting the website of the shipping provider.

Returns:

We hope you love your Pinklay merchandise! That said, in the rare instance that you are not satisfied with your purchase, kindly contact customer care within 48 hours of receiving your merchandise for an exchange or refund. Please ensure that the merchandise is unused, in its original packaging, and in the same condition as you received it. You can request for a reverse pickup for a nominal amount via customer care or choose to ship the product to our facility using any reputable courier that offers a tracking number. All items must be received by our warehouse within 10 working days of requesting the return in order to qualify for return/exchange.

Exceptions:

1. Merchandise bought during the sale period or on sale cannot be exchanged or returned.
2. We do not accept returns or exchanges on infant merchandise for hygiene reasons.
3. We do not accept returns or exchanges on ceramics, canopy, furniture, gift cards, and customized items.

Furniture:

Our furniture is carefully crafted and packed to ensure you receive a defect-free and damage-free product. That said, in the rare case of a damage/defect, please notify customer care immediately after unboxing the furniture. We will assess the nature of damage/defect, and provide an appropriate solution.

Refunds:

For all pre-paid orders, we offer the option of a store credit that is redeemable on our website or refund back in the original mode of payment (shipping fees, if any, are non-refundable). For COD orders, the refund is issued in the form of a store credit redeemable on our website.

settings.gift_disc: Shopping for someone else, but not sure what to gift? Give them the gift of choice with a Pinklay e-gift card - perfect for any occasion and a great way to express your appreciation!

settings.blog_title: DIWALI 2021: 5 HOMEGROWN LABELS TO RING IN DIWALI CELEBRATIONS IN EFFORTLESSLY CHIC FASHION
settings.blog_description: Handblock printing is etched within Indian fashion sensibilities and for something understating yet vivid, Pinklay's range of handcrafted beauties should make their way into your wardrobes.

settings.blog_title: 8 HOMEGROWN BRANDS THAT WILL BRING JOY TO EVERY DESI GIRL’S FESTIVE WARDROBE
settings.blog_description: A sustainable brand, Pinklay partners with more than 400 artisans (200 of whom are women) to create handcrafted products from ethically sourced and natural fabrics.

settings.blog_title: ELLE DIWALI GIFTING GUIDE: MORE THAN 100 OPTIONS UNDER FASHION, BEAUTY & LIFESTYLE
settings.blog_description: Pinklay Tableware: Make brekky-time beautiful with these ceramics that are close to Indian roots and have a pop of modern to it.

settings.blog_title: 10+ DIWALI GIFT IDEAS FOR YOUR LOVED ONES
settings.blog_description: A Classy Tableware Set: A perfect gift for your parents and a fit for the house proud in all of us! Gift this tableware from Pinklay - a brand specializing in home products close to our Indian roots and bring a pop of color to your homes.

settings.blog_title: GO MINIMALIST THIS SEASON!
settings.blog_description: It’s not a new one, but minimalism is a trend that became huge due to the pandemic. Less is more became the basic mantra for everyone. This festive season too, many are opting for a minimalist looks when it comes to fashion and accessories.

settings.blog_title: MEET DAISY TANWANI, WHOSE HOMEGROWN BRAND PINKLAY TAKES INSPIRATION FROM TRAVEL AND EMPHASISES SUSTAINABILITY
settings.blog_description: Leaving a corporate job to start your own venture is a tough task, but Pinklay founder and CEO Daisy Tanwani believes in taking risks.

settings.blog_title: WEDDING DA SEASON HAI! 11 GIFTS YOU CAN GIVE TO YOUR BRIDE-TO-BE BESTIE
settings.blog_description: While everyone might be busy curating shiny, festive wedding gifts for your friend, it is time for you to act like the best friend that you are and think of her comfort before anything else.

settings.blog_title: FESTIVE GREETINGS
settings.blog_description: Looking for Diwali giftings ideas? Then checkout Pinklay's latest collection. Expect home products such as ceramicware, woodenware and platters. They have been especially designed to bring a pop of colour to the Indian homes.

settings.blog_title: LAST MINUTE DIWALI OUTFIT IDEAS
settings.blog_description: Pinklay offers ethical, handcrafted clothing that shouts elegance this holiday season. This collection is mature, elegant, and appealing to minimalist fashionistas! With comfort as their expertise, they provide stylish yet dreamlike styles made of 100 percent organic cotton.

settings.blog_title: QUEST FOR QUIRK
settings.blog_description: Our designs can be inspired globally but they all have an Indian element to them; it could be through craft, or cultural, or nature-inspired elements. We don’t box ourselves to florals or geometric designs or any particular group of motifs.

settings.blog_title: FUTURE OF THE INDIAN HANDICRAFT INDUSTRY
settings.blog_description: The Indian handicraft industry was one of the worst hit during the pandemic and in order to reinstate it to its previous glory, there are a number of steps that can be followed. At the base of it, artisans should be made aware of their work rights and worth.

settings.blog_title: INDIAN ENTREPRENEURS MUST CELEBRATE THEIR HANDCRAFT HISTORY AND WHY!
settings.blog_description: Indian crafts have been a source of inspiration for many global brands. Our varied crafts and designs have often been used to adorn homes and wardrobes worldwide. But, Indian brands have traditionally shied away from embracing them, until recently.

settings.blog_title: WITH HANDBLOCK PRINTS, PATCHWORK AND MORE, HOW THIS LIFESTYLE BRAND IS CLOCKING 3K MONTHLY ORDERS AND EMPOWERING ARTISANS
settings.blog_description: Pinklay, started in 2015, was witnessing gradual growth until the pandemic hit. During the lockdown, the brand managed to not only grow exponentially, but also provided employment to hundreds of artisans who were striving to make ends meet.

settings.blog_title: IMPACT OF THE PANDEMIC ON INDIAN ARTISANS & HANDICRAFTS AND THE REVIVAL STRATEGIES
settings.blog_description: The handloom and handicrafts sector generates employment upwards of 20 million people in India making it the second biggest sector after agriculture. Yet, it was one of the worst-hit sectors during the COVID-19 pandemic.

settings.blog_title: HELPING THE MIGRANTS
settings.blog_description: Our artisans are the makers of our story and it was our turn to stand by them during the pandemic, feels Daisy Tanwani, CEO of brand Pinklay. We increased the number of artisans in our fold to approximately 400, of which 50% are women.

settings.blog_title: BUTLER TRAYS TO BEAUTIFUL CERAMICS: YOUR HOUSE WILL LOOK LIKE A CAFE WITH PINKLAY’S DECOR
settings.blog_description: Stitched, sewn and created from scratch by hundreds of artisans, Pinklay believes in fair trade practices and a life full of colour. So, if you need to perk up your house, their rugs, cushions, bed covers, Ottomans, dinnerwear and more are literally all you need.

settings.blog_title: HELPING THE MIGRANTS
settings.blog_description: Our artisans are the makers of our story and it was our turn to stand by them during the pandemic, feels Daisy Tanwani, CEO of brand Pinklay. We increased the number of artisans in our fold to approximately 400, of which 50% are women.

settings.blog_title: PINKLAY UNVEILS FUSION OUTFITS AND CERAMIC CUTLERY AHEAD OF THE FESTIVE SEASON
settings.blog_description: Mumbai-based label, Pinklay - known for its emphasis on Indian handicrafts -  has carved a niche for itself ever since it launched five years ago. The brand prides itself on incorporating works like block printing, dabu, kantha, and ajrakh.

settings.blog_title: HERE'S WHY KAFTANS ARE BACK IN FASHION
settings.blog_description: Kaftans have come back with a bang. They are free-flowing, airy, and super comfortable. From kaftan tops to kaftan dresses and kimono sleeves blended with kaftans, the evolution is as comfortable as the style.

settings.blog_title: 10 BLOCK-PRINTED CO-ORD SETS YOU NEED TO BOOKMARK FOR THE SUMMER
settings.blog_description: We’ve all had days when we’ve cooked up a storm or cleaned furiously or ticked off a list of pending tasks. For those days, Pinklay’s Blue Pea culotte set works perfectly. It’s roomy enough for a yoga class too.

settings.blog_title: HAND-BLOCK PRINTED COTTON SETS THAT YOU CAN WEAR DAY AND NIGHT
settings.blog_description: When you’re staying home for long periods or working from home, it’s sometimes difficult to keep your day and night outfits separate. This simple need gave rise to the biggest trend of 2020 and now 2021, lounge wear sets.

settings.blog_title: CELEB OUTFITS THAT YOU CAN GET UNDER RS 10,000
settings.blog_description: It's not always that celebs are seen stepping out in expensive clothes. Shahid Kapoor's wife Mira Rajput is a stunner. Once, she shared a photo in a blue floral dress. The dress is from Pinklay’s collection.

settings.blog_title: INDIAN LABELS YOU CAN DRESS YOUR LITTLE ONES IN
settings.blog_description: Dressing up your child will no longer a daunting task—look beyond the mainstream to find these adorable conscious, sustainable and local options.

settings.blog_title: 14 BESPOKE NIGHTWEAR BRANDS THAT SHOULD BE ON YOUR RADAR
settings.blog_description: Love a good block-printed silhouette? Pinklay will be a dream destination for you! The brand has an assortment of easy-breezy coordinated sets, kaftans, robes and other loungewear pieces that will be just the pick-me-ups on dull days.

settings.blog_title: THESE 10 PLACES HAVE JAIPURI RAZAIS THAT ARE PERFECT FOR CURLING UP IN
settings.blog_description: The fact that we do love about them is that most of their designs and colours are a pop of sunshine that can brighten up the dullest Mondays. The stars and parrots are utterly adorable too. We’re loving these for days when we just don’t wanna adult.

settings.blog_title: 6 EXCITING NEW DESIGNERS ON OUR RADAR
settings.blog_description: Current and tasteful, Jaipur born Daisy Tanwani’s brand extracts the best from traditional and modern styles.

settings.blog_title: 7 DESIGN NAMES AND BRANDS TO STALK THIS YEAR
settings.blog_description: Drawing inspiration from the Pink City and the trademark craftsmanship of Rajasthan, Daisy Tanwani’s colourful home decor brand offers everything from block print rugs and zardosi charms to artisanal trays and lanterns.

settings.blog_title: THESE 3 SUCCESSFUL ENTREPRENEURS RECALL THEIR FIRST DAY AT THEIR FIRST JOBS
settings.blog_description: The first day at one’s first job is a huge milestone, an experience that stays with us all our lives. Three successful entrepreneurs reminisce their first day at work and share with HerStory their tips on how youngsters can deal with this new phase of life.

settings.blog_title: DAISY TANWANI’S PINKLAY IS AN UNAPOLOGETIC CELEBRATION OF COLOUR
settings.blog_description: Today, Mumbai-based Pinklay has become a leading home décor, kids’, and accessories brand. Thirty-one-year-old Daisy explains - our design philosophy revolves around unapologetic yet tasteful use of colour. We want to transform the way colour is perceived—from kitschy to classy.

settings.blog_title: MAGICAL NARRATIVES
settings.blog_description: A home décor and furnishing brand, Pinklay, manifests creativity with an amazing amalgamation of colours, patterns and prints! It crafts designs to convey narratives – often inspired from natural elements and diverse crafts and cultures from around the world.

settings.blog_title: PINKLAY: ADDING COLOUR TO LIFE
settings.blog_description: A furnishing brand that creates exclusive designs inspired by natural elements, fusing traditional and contemporary work to craft stunning pieces. Pinklay currently offers an entire range of home décor with over 400 unique products spread across categories.

settings.custom_tab_content:
Shipping:

We currently deliver orders all over India. Free shipping is applicable on orders above INR 1999. A nominal charge of INR 99 is levied on orders below INR 1999. Orders are typically shipped within 24-48 hours (except furniture and custom items) and delivered within 3-6 working days from dispatch. You will receive an e-mail and SMS once your order has been shipped which will include details of the shipping provider and tracking number. You can track your shipment in "Your Orders" or by visiting the website of the shipping provider.

Returns:

We hope you love your Pinklay merchandise! That said, in the rare instance that you are not satisfied with your purchase, kindly contact customer care within 48 hours of receiving your merchandise for an exchange or refund. Please ensure that the merchandise is unused, in its original packaging, and in the same condition as you received it. You can request for a reverse pickup for a nominal amount via customer care or choose to ship the product to our facility using any reputable courier that offers a tracking number. All items must be received by our warehouse within 10 working days of requesting the return in order to qualify for return/exchange.

Exceptions:

1. Merchandise bought during the sale period or on sale cannot be exchanged or returned.
2. We do not accept returns or exchanges on infant merchandise for hygiene reasons.
3. We do not accept returns or exchanges on ceramics, canopy, furniture, gift cards, and customized items.

Furniture:

Our furniture is carefully crafted and packed to ensure you receive a defect-free and damage-free product. That said, in the rare case of a damage/defect, please notify customer care immediately after unboxing the furniture. We will assess the nature of damage/defect, and provide an appropriate solution.

Refunds:

We offer a store credit that is redeemable on our website (shipping fees, if any, are non-refundable).
settings.des: Phasellus lorem malesuada de pulvinar commodo

settings.heading: Dogs of Shiv Nadar University
settings.para: This year we have joined hands with Dogs of Shiv Nadar University, an organization started by Nandini, that feeds, sterilizes and rescues strays in the NCR area. I am so inspired by Nandini’s journey, she personifies where there is a will, there is a way and if you do something with a good heart, it becomes a movement in no time. Being a college student, taking up a responsibility for the voiceless with no expectation in return is not just noble but brave. We will be funding 1500 meals for strays through her.

settings.heading: Grow-Trees Foundation
settings.para: The second foundation we have tied up is Grow Trees. So far, they have planted 9. million trees in 23 states. We will be contributing to their project: Trees for Hanguls. Trees will be grown in the periphery of Dachigam National Park, Kashmir – home of Hanguls, a critically endangered species. Today, less than 200 of them survive, and their only viable population is in Kashmir’s Dachigam National Park. An increase in the green cover is expected to help restore their habitat.

settings.title:
As a child, I often heard my father say…may you always find peace in giving and helping. That was his eternal wish for me and my brothers. And, I am forever grateful to my parents for showing us the joy that giving and gratitude holds. Giving is an act of kindness we do to ourselves. It’s self-love in many ways because I haven’t known anyone who has done an act of kindness – said a polite ‘thank you’ to a stranger, rescued a stray, planted a tree, helped a needy in distress – unhappy or grudged with the help they offered. Instead, I have often experienced that giving gives back happiness, contentment, and peace.

Soon after we started Pinklay in December 2015, we decided to put a small fund aside for animal welfare. A cause very close to my heart. On Pinklay’s first anniversary, we formalized this little initiative and called it ‘the month of giving’. Since then, every December, we celebrate #monthofgiving with much love and enthusiasm. A month where we mindfully practice gratitude and the sentiment of giving back because there isn’t a greater joy than that of giving.

So, this December for every order placed with us, you get a choice to feed a stray or plant a tree through your purchase. A part of the revenue from your order will be directly donated to the organizations we have partnered with for this year’s ‘month of giving’. Then there is more, we have a few chats lined up with very interesting people across the month. Follow us on our pages to know more. I promise you a lovely December filled with gifts, conversations, and offers.

Default.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.
